title: Acceleration of object in uniform electric field

content.question: What is the acceleration of an object of mass 4.5 x 10-5 kg with a charge of 9 x 10-9C under the influence of an electric field of magnitude 5000 V/m, assuming gravity is negligible?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
